body:
Since there's not an official post about this yet I just decided to make one about Vobaseball's new promotion to Official, I just found out he became one and I thought it would be cool to congratulate him as Mango_ had a similar post regarding this.
Well deserved Vobaseball. Looking forward for more from you (^-^)
body_tagged:

title: Congratulations Vobaseball12 > New Official

replies.body: Congrats, but don't an authorized staff member is to post such threads? Just asking, what does "Official" do, and how do they get it?
replies.body_tagged: Congrats, but don't an authorized staff member is to post such threads? Just asking, what does "Official" do, and how do they get it?

replies.body: Officials are basically just a small step up from refs, they are the ones who assign refs what to do. We also help make decisions about the tourney, so it can be the best it can possibly be.
replies.body_tagged: Officials are basically just a small step up from refs, they are the ones who assign refs what to do. We also help make decisions about the tourney, so it can be the best it can possibly be.
